A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Haters gonna hate but it might be the best Star Wars yet (FOR ORIGINALITY). Sorry to everyone who wanted the same damn story for the 9th time. Rian Johnson is the one who rattled the cages and will not only be remembered for this infamously currently but in time also famously for creating a great piece of art that is the last Jedi. We’re there some plot holes? yes but it’s Star Wars! no one left the theaters thinking this is real and needed the exact science of it. People need to get over Lukes death and move on with the newly established characters.✊🏼
